particle._min_dist: Minimum distance allowed between particles to avoid overlap
particle._R1: Inner radius for spherical shell distribution
particle._R2: Outer radius for spherical shell distribution
particle._description: Parameters related to the particle cloud

filament._n_chain: Number of particles per filament chain
filament._rest_length: Rest length between adjacent particles in a filament
filament._min_dist: Minimum distance between filament particles to prevent overlaps
filament._R1: Inner radius for spherical shell distribution
filament._R2: Outer radius for spherical shell distribution
filament._description: Parameters related to the filament cloud

cloud._seed: Random seed for reproducibility of cloud generation

simulation._time_integrator: Time integration method for simulation (Options: 'Explicit Euler', 'Explicit RK4')
simulation._body_force: External body force vector applied to all particles (e.g., gravity)
simulation._dt: Time step size for the simulation
simulation._t_meas: Measurement interval: how often (in time steps) to record output data

model._two_body_model: Path to the neural network model
